items.title: Solar stocks plunge on Senate bill’s tax-credit phase-out, but analysts say investors should be happy
items.description: S&P components Enphase Energy and First Solar move lower by double-digit percentages.

items.title: ‘I’m at my wit’s end’: My niece paid off her husband’s credit card, but fell behind on her taxes. How can I help her?
items.description: “My niece, as smart and brilliant as she is, is not very good with her money.”

items.title: Is the stock market open on Juneteenth? Will the post office deliver mail?
items.description: Here’s what is closed on Juneteenth this Thursday, June 19, to observe the newest federal holiday.

items.title: Trump’s next Fed picks could rock your mortgage and retirement. Buckle up.
items.description: The president is testing the Fed’s limits —understanding his thinking could protect your financial future

items.title: Lennar sees home prices drop to 5-year lows, but they’re still too high
items.description: Lennar sees the average price of homes delivered for the current quarter falling to the lowest levels seen in eight years.
